"'Walls'" is the lead single from The Rocket Summer's album [[Of Men and
Angels]]. The song was written by The Rocket Summer frontman-and sole member-
Bryce Avary, and was released in February 2010. In an interview with AOL, Avary
stated that the song is "about struggles and about having issues in your life
that you just can't seem to quite get a grip on, whether that's depression or
whether that's anything."
